name: Mirrored Arena
description:
Mirrored Arena by Domenico-Labaki

Submission to the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1

WARNING:  This game contains some flashing bright colors that may cause discomfort and/or seizures for those with photosensitive epilepsy. Please do not play if your health is put at risk.

You are stuck in an arena, and there's a huge mirror reflecting everything! Survive as long as you can! When the mirror flashes you can merge with your reflection and you get stronger together!

Instructions in game. Make sure to give your feedback! Also comment your best time!

I have an issue with images where I am not able to upload them. I'll be adding some to the page soon once I can (cover image, screenshots, ...)
